tool_description: CronWeb is a powerful API-based cron job scheduler that allows you to automate tasks and trigger actions at specific times using webhook requests. Simply provide the webhook endpoint, parameters, payload, method, headers, and a cron format, and CronWeb will handle the rest, executing your jobs seamlessly.
name: CronWeb - Webhook-Driven Cron Job Scheduler
title: CronWeb - Webhook-Driven Cron Job Scheduler

api_list.name: schedule_create
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cronweb-webhook-driven-cron-job-scheduler.p.rapidapi.com/schedule/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cronweb-webhook-driven-cron-job-scheduler.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cronweb-webhook-driven-cron-job-scheduler.p.rapidapi.com/schedule/"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
